definition: offensive to good taste especially in sexual matters
details:
adjective
- offensive to good taste especially in sexual matters
= example: offensive to good taste especially in sexual matters
- offending against sexual mores in conduct or appearance
= example: offending against sexual mores in conduct or appearance
= synonyms: immodest
- not in keeping with accepted standards of what is right or proper in polite society
= example: not in keeping with accepted standards of what is right or proper in polite society
= synonyms: indecorous
